title: Willing to coach any team, will even form a team to coach for
body:
Hey all!

I just recently transferred over to OCE region and I was wondering if any pre-made teams needs someone to help them out in Team ranks or just gameplays in general.

I have played in multiple regions (EU/NA/SEA) and I have knowledge of different things:
- Champ technical abilities
- Cross-map rotations
- Lane minion manipulation
- Objective controls

I have played all lanes in different ranks (highest up to Plat 5 (with elo up to Diamond)) but stopped due to academics.

Some requirements needed from the team:
- Mature and willingness to learn and listen to opinions
- Willingness to work within a team

If you have a team that needs a coach please leave a reply here or
add me LoL IGN: Takethatmadafaka

Thanks a bunch!

replies.body: i main support currently getting advice of silver players learnt alot from them i believe i can do better im trying a new role as a top laner, im on most days willig to learn

hey man I don't have a team but would like to be in one I'm mature and willing to learn and listen I main adc and next pref lane in mid I am low elo atm but just see me play befor you judge lol name HAppY101
